Texture corresponds to glmc::glmc()

Source: R/Zonestats.R
texture.Rd

Texture corresponds to glmc::glmc()

Usage

texture(
  img.color,
  grays = 7,
  window = c(9, 9),
  metrics = c("variance", "second_moment")
)

Arguments

img.color

image with three color channels. Will be converted in gray scale. raster format required.

grays

number of gray shades. Documentation is lacking, see: ?glmc::glmc()

window

convolution window size e.g., c(3,3)

metrics

texture metrics based on illumination differences. see:: ?glmc::glmc() for available methods

Value

raster with each layer correspond to on metric

Examples

data(rgb_Oulanka2023_Session03_T067)
img = rgb_Oulanka2023_Session03_T067
texture(img, 7, c(9,9), metrics = "second_moment")
#> Warning: [rast] unknown extent
#> Warning: [rast] unknown extent
#> Warning: [rast] unknown extent
#> Warning: [rast] unknown extent
